item.title: What I like about Python
item.description: Lynn Root asked in twitter what you like and like to improve in python https://twitter.com/roguelynn/status/259338864664125440. Following are my observation Likes Importance to documentation.. Clean syntax. Easy to get started for non CS background people. lot of smart programmers. Libraries like IPython, requests, flask. Creating libraries like pygments, sphinx, readthedocs to solve * REAL * problem. I would like/want to improve python.org site While programmers are reading docs.
